AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: response gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a gokusotsu who specialized in patrolling and immediate response security according to the situation. After major disasters in mortal world, [PAWN_pronoun] would rush to the reception area and perform duties almost without a break. Calming down delirious, violent dead was also [PAWN_possessive] important job.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plumber gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was well versed in the maintenance of all the pipes of infrastructure in hell...which means, the pipes through which boiling blood or metal, rotting guts, vomit, and liquefied dead pass.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: blood Pond gardener gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s workplace was the maintenance area of boiling pools and blood pond to throw the dead into.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hariyama gardener
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a forest worker who worked with the iron pines and iron bamboos that grew on the needle mountains where the dead was forced to climb. [PAWN_possessive] main daily routine was to cut woods down according to the demand for iron and to remove tangled dead from their branches.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: metallic craftsman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a craftsman who specialized in small daily metalwork items like iron kettles and iron ladles. And was also good at making restraints and small firearms.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pottery craftsman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a craftsman who excelled at making ceramics such as tea bowls and water bottles. And was also good at making urns and clay figurines.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: children's limbo gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of breaking down stones piled up by dead children on the riverbank of the Sanzu River.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sanzu river carpenter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of maintaining the bridge over the middle reaches of the Sanzu River. [PAWN_pronoun] was also put in charge of mining precious stones for decoration.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sanzu river shooter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s task was to shoot arrows at the heads of the dead swimming in the Sanzu River downstream.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: embezzler gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was waiting in the detention area to be sentenced to approximately 36283216763924704214800100074291078163892000000 years in prison as a result of embezzling public funds and pouring them into young lover.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fire watch
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: In hell, flames of all sizes are used. [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of watching over them to keep them alive, as well as burning the sparks that were about to go out and blowing them back.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bangashira
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was popular among subordinates as a personable and dependable boss, but was very neurotic because of the hardships of middle management.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bangashira
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] bullied many new subordinates as a bad boss, but [PAWN_nameDef] himself was not stressed and enjoyed [PAWN_possessive] work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: manure-pond gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a manpower to carry resources to the manure pond which the dead were thrown in. In the last 100 years, the number of jobs has been decreasing due to the spread of flush toilets in hell.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: returnee gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expatriate sent to the interfaith hell for technological innovation and cultural exchange.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: food stall gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a food cart owner who traveled from site to site pulling custom chuckwagon. The food was not very good, but for an extra fee, [PAWN_nameDef] would sneak in a few drinks even in working time, so it was a thriving business.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: food stall gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a food cart owner who traveled from site to site pulling custom chuckwagon. [PAWN_pronoun] was a hard man who would never serve alcohol to those on duty, but served good, proper food so it was a thriving business.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Express messenger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to run around areas where messenger ravens couldn't reach, but one day [PAWN_pronoun] was transferred to office work inside the Information and Telegraph Department when a super high-tech machine called a "facsimile" appeared on the scene. [PAWN_nameDef] is excited because [PAWN_pronoun] no longer has to reconcile with the machines since [PAWN_pronoun] was sent from the "gate" to an uncivilized alien world, but will [PAWN_pronoun] be able to keep up with the spacer technology on this planet...?

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Belt conveyor worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]s job was to put a dandelion on the dead as they came down the conveyor belt. [PAWN_pronoun] put dandelions on the dead for 50 hours a day without questioning what they were for, and without knowing that they were not dandelions at all but chrysanthemums.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: U-turn gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a dream and once went out to the earth, but wherever [PAWN_pronoun] went, [PAWN_pronoun] could not get along with the native yokai, land gods, and local people, so [PAWN_nameDef] returned to [PAWN_possessive] former workplace.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: I-turn gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] originally lived on earth, but moved to hell to escape human pressure and the effects of urban development, and was re-employed as a hell guard.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Teacher gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soft-spoken teacher who worked at an educational institution was known as a Buddha in hell.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Teacher gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soft-spoken teacher who worked at an educational institution was known as a true demon teacher.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Teacher gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the kind of sloppy teacher who, if anything happened, would immediately turn to self-study and take a nap himself in the staff room.
